education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Minor in Statistics

experience.title: Assistant Front End Manager
bullets: Experienced in customer service with a proven track record of efficiently managing customer service operations in a high-volume grocery store environment.
Skilled in leading a team of associates to ensure exceptional customer satisfaction and effective conflict resolution.

experience.title: Online Pickup Shopper
bullets: Managed and fulfilled online pickup orders for Target customers with attention to detail and customer service.
Consistently met or exceeded productivity and accuracy goals.

projects.title: Unraid Plugin: Hello World
projects.description: A basic Unraid plugin built to explore the Unraid plugin system. Provides a simple UI panel and logs a message on install.

projects.title: YouTube Archiver
projects.description: A self-hosted Django app that archives YouTube videos locally with metadata and web-based browsing.

projects.title: Inventory Management System
projects.description: A web-based system for tracking workshop tools and checkouts using Django and QR codes.

projects.title: Buddy Backup for Unraid
projects.description: A distributed backup system designed for Unraid where each server only has access to its designated folder on another trusted server. Ensures clear separation of access and mutual backups.
